descriptionHtml:
this is by far the most simple batch file you will get.. this is with the help of 2 different people
<br />http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34469/?
<br />that is one of them
This is a batch file that gives you anything you could use in skyrim and I will be doing an updated File in the near future. This gives you god like powers and will allow difficult things to become simple, WARNING DO NOT TYPE IN "BAT MAN" TO MANY TIMES FOR IT WILL CRASH especially when I update it more so use wisely.
author: KingKushII
